https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9uIOioADIOMKXhfVLVYlm0F9eSg.jpg Set in Ireland, the story centers on a day in the life of Shevawn, an innocent, 30-year-old dreamer who is domineered by her innkeeper brother. An American tourist with a troubled marriage gives Shevawn's life new meaning. A Wind from the South
